confirmed_diagnoses.name: Low Testosterone

confirmed_diagnoses.treatment_plan: Hormone replacement therapy (HRT) recommended or ongoing.

confirmed_diagnoses.name: High Blood Pressure (Hypertension)

confirmed_diagnoses.treatment_plan: Prescribed antihypertensive medication and advised dietary/lifestyle changes.
